2025 Philadelphia Phillies Statistics

2024 Season

Record: 47-31, 1st place in NL_East (Schedule and Results)

Playoff Odds: 75.1% to make postseason, 4.0% to win World Series

Manager: Rob Thomson (47-31)

President: David Dombrowski (President, Baseball Operations)

General Manager: Preston Mattingly (VP & GM)

Farm Director: Luke Murton

Scouting Director: Brian Barber

Ballpark: Citizens Bank Park

Attendance: 1,662,849 (2nd of 15)

Park Factors: (Over 100 favors batters, under 100 favors pitchers.)
    Multi-year: Batting - 104, Pitching - 103
    One-year: Batting - 116, Pitching - 115

Pythagorean W-L: 43-35, 369 Runs, 328 Runs Allowed
